DOC.brief_title: ProGrip Mesh Repair vs Lichtenstein Operation
DOC.detailed_description: Single-center patient-blinded randomized clinical trial compare self-gripping mesh ( Parietex ProGrip ) standard Lichtenstein method use lightweight polypropylene mesh . Patients randomly allocate Lichtenstein Operation ( L ) ProGrip Repair ( R ) group . Patients follow one year . The primary outcome measure : postoperative pain use Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) Numeric Rating Scale ( NRS ) . Assessments make surgery , day discharge , 1 , 6 12 month postoperatively . Secondary endpoint : recurrence rate , post-operative complication ( short long-term ) , foreign body sensation , incidence surgical-site injury , cost , hospital stay , surgery duration , safety patient satisfaction .
